name: Rooms Linked
description:
Game Description

Rooms Linked is a small puzzle game where you are playing multiple characters.

Rules

You have to place all your characters on the red slab to finish the puzzle. Be careful, all characters are linked that is why there are moving simultaneously.

Controls

Arrows : Move

P (x2) : Skip the current puzzle

Credits Assets
  • Sprites & tiles by CodeManu.
Sound
  • Music by Tallbeard Studios.
  • SFX by Kenney.
Font
  • Pixel font by Kenney.
